entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing late this afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 80 over southern sections late this morning and this afternoon. High 7. Forecast issued 06:34 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 80 over southern sections this evening. Wind becoming light late this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 06:34 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of freezing rain or rain. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of freezing rain late in the morning and early afternoon then 60 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. Forecast issued 06:34 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022
